transport.question: I go 'beep beep!' and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Sometimes your family rides in me.

transport.question: I float on the water and can take you to an island. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am bigger than a fish.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.

transport.question: I go 'choo choo' on the tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 📣 I make a loud noise when I'm coming.

transport.question: You ride me with your feet. I have two wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🛣️ I can go on the road or a path.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow, and I take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛣️ I follow a set route each day.

transport.question: I carry people through the city, stopping often to let them on and off. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
💰 You usually need to pay to ride me.

transport.question: I zoom really fast! I have two wheels and you have to wear a helmet. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle.
👨‍✈️ A driver turns a handle to go!

transport.question: I have a bed and a kitchen and travel the roads, it is a house on wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🛌 I'm bigger than a car, but smaller than a bus.
🏕️ I am a popular way to travel on vacation.

transport.question: I help people when there's a fire, and I'm bright red with a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a very loud sound.
💧 I carry water to put out the flames.
🔥 I help the firemen and women.

bug.question: I have spots and can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have lots of round dots
🍃 I like to land on leaves and flowers

additionalData.description: A red bug with black spots.

bug.question: I make honey. What am I?

additionalData.description: A yellow and black bug that makes honey.

bug.question: I crawl and carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size
🌱 I can carry leaves and crumbs

additionalData.description: A tiny black bug that works together in a colony.

bug.question: I jump really high and am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to live in the grass

additionalData.description: A green bug that can jump far.

bug.question: I can fly and have colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to sip nectar from flowers

additionalData.description: A flying bug with colorful wings.

bug.question: I live in a web. What am I?

additionalData.description: A bug with eight legs that spins webs.

bug.question: I light up at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ People call me a light bug

additionalData.description: A bug that lights up at night.

bug.question: I have long wings and fly near water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I like to live near ponds and lakes
💨 My wings are thin and see-through

additionalData.description: A bug with long wings that flies near water.

bug.question: I eat wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I live inside trees and wood structures
🐜 I'm not an ant but I look like one

additionalData.description: A small white bug that eats wood.

bug.question: I buzz and bite. What am I?

additionalData.description: A bug that buzzes and bites.
